channel.title: WebDev on Paul's Particles
channel.description: Recent content in WebDev on Paul's Particles

item.title: Creating a Table of Contents
item.description: Ok, so as my blog has been growing recently, I decided it was about time I started implementing some more features. One of the things I wanted to add was a little floating table of contents. From there, users would be able to more easily navigate through a given page, and as I have just recently implemented my codex, I felt it was about time to create this. As I found it rather difficult to find things about this online, I wanted to quickly share my implementation. I will be using HTML, Javascript and CSS.
